com.qtplaf.library.swing.core

Class TableModelRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • com.qtplaf.library.swing.core.TableModelRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel

    public class TableModelRecord
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    A table model aimed to work with sets of records.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • sort

        public void sort(Order order)
        Sort data based on the order.
        Parameters:
        order - The order.

      • sort

        public void sort()
        Sort this table model based on the installed comparator. If a total record exists at the end of the list, its position is preserved.

      • removeAllColumns

        public void removeAllColumns()
        Remove all columns. Note that when all columns are removed, the editable configuration of all cells is not lost, so if the columns are added in a different order the configuration remains active.

      • removeColumn

      • setCellEditable

        public void setCellEditable(int rowIndex,
                            int fieldIndex)
        Set the cell editable.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The row, if -1 all rows are editable.
        fieldIndex - The field index, -1 all fields are editable.

      • setCellEditable

                            int fieldIndex,
                            boolean editable)
        Set the cell editable.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The row, if -1 all rows are editable.
        fieldIndex - The field index, -1 all fields are editable.
        editable - A boolean that indicates if the cell is editable.
